projects.name: Brags
projects.description: A Python library to configure and build dynamic Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipelines. Integrates Python and Go for performance while leveraging LangChain abstractions.

projects.name: Toy_Grep
projects.description: A custom regex engine built from scratch in Go. Demonstrates regex parsing, pattern matching, and core text search algorithms.

projects.name: Credenz Main App
projects.description: REST API backend with Django and a companion Flutter app for event management. Achieved 100+ Play Store downloads and streamlined event workflows.

projects.name: Bloom rs
projects.description: High-performance Bloom Filter implementations in Rust optimized for concurrency. Focused on memory efficiency and scalability under heavy workloads.

projects.name: myDB
projects.description: A SQL database written from scratch in Rust. Implements core concepts like B+ trees, query parsing, and storage management inspired by SQLite.

projects.name: EduNexus
projects.description: An e-learning platform built with Django to connect students and educators. Provides course management, user authentication, and content delivery features.
